id.description: The ID of the user. Primary Key.
id.comment: Eliminates the need to have our own arbitrary 'id' field, correlates back to the github user.

login.description: The login name of the user.

location.description: The ID of the user's location. Foreign Key (Location table).

url.description: The API URL for the user.

html_url.description: The HTML URL for the user.
